featured.text: Since the courses can be taken by hundreds of thousands of students at the same time, the number of universities might decrease dramatically.
As India’s size decreases, the thickness of the Himalayas increases.
The purchasing power of teenagers has been decreasing over the years.

other.text: Which of the following statements can be supported by the passage? (A) A robot was designed to let humans decrease their productivity.
To make fresh lemonade, cut the lemon in half, _____ the juice into a bowl, and then add as much water and sugar as you like. (A) decrease (B) squeeze (C) freeze (D) cease 12.
It was predicted that there would be a decrease of 20 percent in the pigeon population in the first year and between 70 and 80 percent in four or five years.

definition.en_def: to become smaller or less in amount, size, or degree
definition.example: The company plans to decrease its production costs.
